name: explosion
effect: User faints, even if the attack fails or misses. Inflicts regular damage.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user attacks everything around it by causing a tremendous explosion. The user faints upon using this move.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user attacks everything around it by causing a tremendous explosion. The user faints upon using this move.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user attacks everything around it by causing a tremendous explosion. The user faints upon using this move.
